subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Terrell Owens’s latest end zone celebration — dropping into a sprinter’s crouch at the goal line during Sunday’s victory against the Browns — came with the usual price: a 15-yard penalty.
snippet: Terrell Owens’s latest end zone celebration — dropping into a sprinter’s crouch at the goal line during Sunday’s victory against the Browns — came with the usual price: a 15-yard penalty.
